TopicTitle: Clicking on tracking station locks buildings.

Articles.Content:
Version:

  • KSP: 1.0.4 (Win32) - Unity: 4.6.4f1 - OS: Windows 8.1 (6.3.10240) 64bit (Happens on 32-bit as well. No change)

Mods: (As reported by KSP-AVC

  • Community Resource Pack - 0.4.5
  • Contract Configurator - 1.7.7
  • Contract Pack: Anomaly Surveyor - 1.4.2
  • CC-CP-SCANSat - 0.5.2.1
  • Contract Pack: Kerbal Space Station - 3.0.1
  • Contract Pack: RemoteTech - 2.0.1
  • Crowd Sourced Science - 3.0.1
  • Firespitter - 7.1.4
  • RasterPropMonitor - 0.23.2
  • Kerbal Attachment System - 0.5.4
  • Kerbal Engineer Redux - 1.0.18
  • Kerbal Inventory System - 1.2.2
  • KSP-AVC Plugin - 1.1.5
  • ModularFlightIntegrator - 1.1.1
  • Near Future Electrical - 0.5.3
  • QuickGoTo - 1.2
  • QuickHide - 3.0.2
  • QuickSearch - 1.1.4
  • RemoteTech - 1.6.8
  • SCANsat - 1.1.4.2
  • Kerbal Alarm Clock - 3.4
  • Waypoint Manager - 2.4.2

Reproduction Steps:

  1. Open new save, or old save.
  2. Click on Tracking Station.

Problem:

  • Tracking Stations doesn't open
  • Can't click on any buildings
  • Rest of UI works
  • Saving and Reloading does not work, once the station is clicked again - the bug returns.

Edited October 27, 2015 by NictraSavios
